attributes.action: Move council tax non-payment months to Dec & Jan to help with winter fuel costs
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government can make all councils do this by amending the Council Tax (Administration and Enforcement) Regulations 1992.
attributes.background: On a 10 month direct debit plan, council tax isn't paid in April or May, please just change that to December and January to give everyone more money during the cold winter months to help with fuel costs and Christmas expenses.
